itunes:summary:
A mom asks Janet whether she should put the kibosh on her daughter’s body painting or just accept it as healthy artistic exploration. 

For more on common parenting issues, please check out this new audio resource -- "Sessions" -- my recorded consultations with parents: SessionsAudio.com.
